seller_description: Ignite creativity and curiosity with the 6-in-1 STEM Robotics Kit, a hands-on educational toy designed to inspire budding inventors aged 8-12. This all-in-one science kit allows kids to build and explore six exciting projects, including a reptile robot, balance car, bubble machine, fiber lamp, and buzzer wire game. Perfect for fostering a love of science, technology, engineering, and math, this kit combines fun and learning. Parents can enjoy meaningful family bonding time by helping kids complete these engaging experiments, creating cherished memories together. Each kit comes with a mini screwdriver and detailed step-by-step instructions for easy assembly, ensuring a hassle-free experience. Packaged in a beautiful gift box, these safe, odorless materials make this an ideal gift for birthdays, Christmas, or science fairs. Encourage your child to learn by playing, sparking their curiosity and introducing them to the excitement of circuits and engineering. (Requires bubble solution and AA batteries, not included.) Perfect for young creators, this kit is a fun and educational gateway to the world of STEM!
review: The fiber optic lamp project was missing key parts, and without them, the activity was incomplete. This made the overall experience unsatisfactory for my child.
Expected-output: The absence of essential components for the fiber optic lamp contradicts the seller's promise of a complete and enjoyable kit for children. The discrepancy between the seller's description and the buyer's experience shows that the seller is at fault for providing an incomplete product.
label: 0:Here seller is at fault
